item.name: Balthazar of the Barossa
item.description: Anita Bowen announced her occupation as a 40-something sex therapist with a 17-year involvement in the wine industry. Anita undertook her first vintage at Mudgee, then McLaren Vale, and ultimately the Barossa; she worked at St Hallet while studying at Roseworthy College. A versatile lady, indeed. As to her wine, she says,Anyway, prepare a feast, pour yourself a glass (no chalices, please) of Balthazar and share it with your concubines. Who knows? It may help to lubricate thoughts, firm up ideas and get the creative juices flowing! Exports to the UK, Canada and Singapore.
